hook: The most exclusive club in Santa Clara right now isn't a luxury suiteâ€”it's the concrete tunnel leading to the locker rooms, and your badge probably doesn't work anymore.

sections.title: The Gold Level Surprise
key_points: Secret Service assumed control of field tunnels 12 hours early.
Local credentialing lists were quietly overridden.
The handover happened at 14:00 PST, catching teams mid-prep.
stats_facts: Protocol: 'Gold Level' security usually starts Game Day morning.
Impact: Southeast and Southwest tunnels effectively sealed.
Source: 'They changed the encryption keys at 4 AM.'
sections.transition: For the team staff arriving for afternoon walkthroughs, the result was immediate gridlock at the checkpoints.

sections.title: Red Light District
key_points: Standard NFL 'All-Access' passes are being rejected.
Santa Clara PD credentials are no longer recognized.
A secondary biometric overlay is now mandatory.
stats_facts: Visual: Checkpoints are flashing 'Invalid' red lights.
Scope: Affects trainers, equipment staff, and medical personnel.
Quote: 'It's a turf war. The Feds decided the local list was porous.'
sections.transition: The technology failure isn't just about permissions; it's about the physics of the stadium bowels.

sections.title: The RF Jam
key_points: Biometric scanners are failing due to interference.
The stadium's RF environment is too dense for the new tech.
Processing times have slowed to a crawl.
stats_facts: Cause: High-density RF environment in concrete tunnels.
Effect: Latency issues causing long queues.
Stat: 400+ essential staff currently in limbo.
sections.transition: While the machines buffer, the tension is boiling over at the command center.

sections.title: The EOC Standoff
key_points: Team Security Directors are in emergency meetings.
The 'Unified Command' is fracturing over jurisdiction.
Federal agents are refusing to revert to the old list.
stats_facts: Quote: 'My badge gets me into the Pentagon, but not the locker room.'
sections.transition: The proposed solution requires equipment that simply isn't there yet.

sections.title: The Mobile Unit Gap
key_points: Re-badging everyone requires specific mobile units.
Those units are still in transit from off-site.
Teams are stuck waiting for hardware to arrive.
stats_facts: Requirement: Mobile processing units for biometric intake.
Quote: 'We have trainers stuck in the parking lot.'
sections.transition: Until those trucks arrive, the road to the Super Bowl field ends at the tunnel guard post.
